text: Takali is a village in the Karmala taluka of Solapur district in Maharashtra state, India. ==Demographics== Covering and comprising 500 households at the time of the 2011 census of India, Takali had a population of 2307. There were 1171 males and 1136 females, with 298 people being aged six or younger. ==References== Category:Villages in Karmala taluka
title: Takali
